# ZeitPal - Leave Management That Just Works

> Modern, open-source, GDPR-compliant absence and leave management software for European companies

> For comprehensive documentation, see: /llms-full.txt

## About ZeitPal

ZeitPal is a SaaS platform that simplifies vacation planning, sick leave reporting, and absence tracking for teams. Built specifically for the German and European market, it ensures compliance with German labor law (BUrlG) and GDPR regulations.

**Website:** https://zeitpal.com
**Documentation:** https://docs.zeitpal.com
**Demo:** https://zeitpal.com

## Why ZeitPal?

- **Free for teams up to 20 employees** - No credit card required, free forever
- **Setup in under 15 minutes** - So intuitive, no training required
- **100% GDPR compliant** - Data hosted in Germany/EU
- **German labor law compliant** - Supports all 16 German federal states with automatic holiday calculations
- **Saves 5+ hours of admin work per month** - Replace Excel spreadsheets and email chaos
- **500+ teams trust ZeitPal** - Proven solution for startups and SMEs

## Core Features

### Leave Management
- One-click leave requests and approvals
- Visual team calendar for availability overview
- Automatic leave balance calculations (remaining days, carryover, pro-rata)
- Flexible approval workflows
- Email and Slack notifications

### Sick Leave Tracking
- Digital sick leave reporting
- Certificate reminders
- Compliance tracking

### Supported Absence Types
- Vacation (Urlaub)
- Sick Leave (Krankheit)
- Child Sick Leave (Kindkrank)
- Parental Leave (Elternzeit)
- Maternity Leave (Mutterschutz)
- Special Leave (Sonderurlaub)
- Overtime Compensation (Überstundenabbau)
- Training/Education (Weiterbildung)
- Unpaid Leave

### Integrations
- Google Calendar sync
- Slack notifications
- API access (Enterprise)
- SSO/SAML (Enterprise)
